events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and classified under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our hiring team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out soon to schedule the next steps in the interview process.
You successfully completed the initial screening call where we discussed your experience with software development and project management.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview on Thursday afternoon.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior development team for May 16th at 2 PM UTC.
You completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and deep knowledge of software engineering principles.
An HR interview has been arranged for you on May 20th to discuss company culture, benefits, and to answer any remaining questions.
The HR interview went well with engaging discussion about your career goals and expectations from the workplace environment.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
Your acceptance of the offer has been confirmed, and we are excited to welcome you onboard as a key contributor to our software development projects.
The onboarding process has started, providing you access to all necessary tools, documentation, and introductions to the engineering team.
The hiring process has been successfully completed, and you are now officially part of our engineering department.
